CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 1 Among photovoltaic polymers , regioregular poly(3-hexylthiophene) ( P3HT ) has been extensively studied.

Let's think step by step.

1. Photovoltaic polymers
2. Regioregular poly(3-hexylthiophene) (P3HT)

Both "photovoltaic polymers" and "regioregular poly(3-hexylthiophene)" are Material Names in this paragraph. The first one refers to a general class of materials, while the second one refers to a specific type of material within that class.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. Regioregular poly(3-hexylthiophene) (P3HT)

The other entity "photovoltaic polymers" is a broader category that includes many different materials, so it is not a specific Material Name in this context.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 1 Among photovoltaic polymers , regioregular poly(3-hexylthiophene) ( P3HT ) has been extensively studied.

Let's think step by step.

1. Photovoltaic polymers
2. P3HT (regioregular poly(3-hexylthiophene))

These are the entities that can be identified as "Property Name" in the given paragraph. "Photovoltaic polymers" is a type or category of polymers, while "P3HT" is a specific name of a polymer (regioregular poly(3-hexylthiophene)).
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.
1. P3HT (regioregular poly(3-hexylthiophene)) - This is the only entity in the paragraph that refers to a material property, specifically a type of polymer.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 1 Among photovoltaic polymers , regioregular poly(3-hexylthiophene) ( P3HT ) has been extensively studied.

Let's think step by step.

1. Photovoltaic polymers: This is a type or category of polymers used in photovoltaics or solar cells. It is not a specific property value, but rather a class or group of materials.
2. Regioregular poly(3-hexylthiophene) (P3HT): This is a specific type of photovoltaic polymer. It is a polymer with a particular regioregularity (a property related to the arrangement of its chemical units) and a specific chemical structure (3-hexylthiophene). Therefore, "regioregular" and "3-hexylthiophene" could be considered as properties or attributes of P3HT. However, "P3HT" itself is the main entity in this context.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. regioregular
2. 3-hexylthiophene (as a property or attribute of P3HT)

These entities refer to specific properties or attributes of the material (P3HT) in the context of the paragraph.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| regioregular |
| 3-hexylthiophene (as a property or attribute of P3HT) |
